author: Source: Echo-news.co.uk
title: Scientists claim breakthrough in quest for new quantum computer - Echo-news.co.uk
text:
The Australian team has paved the way for production of the first quantum computing "chips" by building a logic gate using the new technology based on silicon. Logic gates are the fundamental building blocks of computer circuits - the logically controlled "switches" that allow calculations to be made.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Echo-news.co.uk.
